service.title: Common Policy: A Document Format for Expressing Privacy Preferences
service.documentation: This document defines a framework for authorization policies controlling access to application-specific data. This framework combines common location- and presence-specific authorization aspects. An XML schema specifies the language in which common policy rules are represented. The common policy framework can be extended to other application domains.
